cs.IT, cs.CC, cs.DS, cs.CR, cs.NT. 

The paper deals with the construction of locally decodable codes, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT) and computational complexity (cs.CC). The use of Mersenne primes and the connection to number theory suggest that the paper may also be relevant to the sub-categories of data structures and algorithms (cs.DS), cryptography (cs.CR), and number theory (cs.NT).
